text: The Romantic Englishwoman is a 1975 British drama movie directed by Joseph Losey and adapted from the novel by Thomas Wiseman. It stars Michael Caine, Glenda Jackson, Helmut Berger, Michael Lonsdale, Kate Nelligan and Tom Chatto. == Other websites == * Category:1975 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph Losey
title: The Romantic Englishwoman
